tool_description: Precisely target mobile audiences and increase ROI Drawbridge technology enables targeting across devices to drive CPI, CPL, CPA, and customer lifetime value. Drawbridge's technology bridges audiences across devices and enables two mobile targeting and optimization products.
name: Drawbridge Ad Request
title: Drawbridge Ad Request

api_list.name: Ad Request
api_list.description: Please check http://doc.drawbrid.ge/#65,67,82- for additional optional parameters.  Server-to-server integration for mediation and ad exchanges.  With server-to-server integration, mediation and ad exchanges can let Drawbridge programmaticaly buy and serve ad impressions on their network. The APIs are based on standard HTTP protocol, making the integration simple and easy to maintain. In most cases, the integration takes as little as one or two days.

required_parameters.name: _clip
required_parameters.description: Client IP address - In case of a mobile device, this is the IP address closest to the device. It could be a carrier IP address or Wi-Fi IP address.

required_parameters.name: _ifa
required_parameters.description: Identifier for Advertising (iOS only) - this should be RAW.

required_parameters.name: _did
required_parameters.description: SHA1 of Android_id. If this field is not available, use _imeisha1 in optional parameters section.

required_parameters.name: _aid
required_parameters.description: Appstore ID - Application id if request is from a native iPhone/Android application.

required_parameters.name: _pu
required_parameters.description: Page URL- The main page (parent) URL hosting the iframe for the ad request. This is only applicable if the ad request is from a mobile web browser.

required_parameters.name: _puuid
required_parameters.description: Partner detected Unique User id (if available) - this is a unique identifier for users visiting the web page detected by the partner via cookies or other mechanisms

required_parameters.name: _ua
required_parameters.description: Browser user agent if available for mobile devices or desktops/laptops. When user agent is not available, for ex. within mobile apps, supply the _dev* parameters listed below.
